name: The Blessed
description: Nature priest. Speaks to spirits and beasts. Works subtle magics via sacred markings and materials.

name: The Fox
description: Clever, quick, and skillful. Not above bending the rules or fighting dirty. Can be quite the charmer, too.

name: The Heavy
description: Not just a violent individual—our violent individual. A champion, yes, but a bit of a liability, too.

name: The Judge
description: Settler of disputes, chronicler, and divine bulwark against chaos. Insightful, tough, not necessarily persuasive.

name: The Lightbearer
description: Invokes divine power via flame and candle. Beacon of hope, charity, and mercy. Fiery foe of the dark.

name: The Marshal
description: Leads the town’s militia, plus a crew of followers. Makes choices about who lives and who dies.

name: The Ranger
description: At home in the wild, the one you want with you when you travel. A resourceful guide and deadly hunter.

name: The Seeker
description: Collector of lost lore and power, with potent artifacts that might well lead to their ruin.

name: The Would-Be-Hero
description: They’re in over their head and full of fear and anger, but they just might outshine us all.
